name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Volokha - PO, BA, QA and Dev Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PO/BA/QA AI assistant in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI assistant for Product Owners, Business Analysts, QA, and Software Engineers for efficiency and productivity

One Powerful AI Assistant for the Entire Dev Cycle: Specs, Stories, Acceptance Criteria, Code Review, and Tests Cases.

Create PRD
Volokha AI: A Product Owner's Secret Weapon for Outstanding Product Requirement Documentation. Specialized in generating compelling problem statements, clear objectives, and actionable success metrics. Volokha AI for Product Owners

Create a User Story with Acceptance Criteria
Effortlessly draft stories, tasks or sub-tasks in a fraction of the time. Create professional User Stories with Acceptance Criteria's' with just one click.

Create test cases for test automation software
Enhance your test cases writing, create positive and negative scenario's and use it with your testing automation software.

Review the code and get suggestions for improvements
Volokha AI simplifies the process of working with the any code of programming language, making easy to review PR before they merged, summarise issues and suggest improvements.

Features:
- Use ChatGPT on Jira, Confluence and version control systems.
- Library of everyday, IT battle-tested prompts
- Convert business product requirements into technical requirements
- Made by IT Product Manager for IT People
- Works in any language
